title: IGF Call for NRIs Grants
content: IGF Call for NRIs Grants Herman Johansen Wed, 28/01/2026 - 16:22 Now open: IGF 2025 call to apply for financial grants to support implementation of the NRIs annual meetings.  (Application deadline: 11 February 2026). Read More Link https://www.intgovforum.org/en/content/igf-call-for-nris-grants
creator: Herman Johansen
sourceTitle: Internet Governance Forum (IGF) - The IGF is a global multistakeholder platform that facilitates the discussion of public policy issues pertaining to the Internet

title: Call for Nominations - MAG 2026
content: Call for Nominations - MAG 2026 Herman Johansen Wed, 14/01/2026 - 08:48 All stakeholders are now invited to submit nominations for the  MAG . Successful nominees will become part of the  MAG  for a period of one year and will contribute to the ‎multistakeholder ‎consultation process. Read More Link https://www.intgovforum.org/en/content/mag-2026-renewal

title: Leadership Panel Report
content: Leadership Panel Report mazzucchi.eleo… Tue, 30/12/2025 - 16:45 The IGF Leadership Panel has submitted its report to the UN Secretary-General, with recommendations for the future of the IGF and digital governance. title: UN News: WSIS+20
content: UN News: WSIS+20 Herman Johansen Sun, 21/12/2025 - 11:49 UN Member States pledged to narrow widening digital divides and put stronger safeguards around artificial intelligence (AI), as the General Assembly concluded a major review of how the world manages the Internet and fast-evolving digital technologies. Read the UN News article on the WSIS+20 Review.   Read More Link https://news.un.org/en/story/2025/12/1166623

title: IGF's Permanent Mandate!
content: IGF's Permanent Mandate! Herman Johansen Sun, 21/12/2025 - 11:40 The IGF has officially been made a permanent forum of the United Nations! Read the outcome document of the WSIS+20 review by UNGA.  Read More Link https://digitallibrary.un.org/record/4095872?ln=en&v=pdf
